analysis.description:
PonziSeller.withdrawETH (/unique_chucks/22/0x7d7415e984f21da7b2ccf7253e3198e7c3ab8dce.sol#186-193) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(amountWei) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7d7415e984f21da7b2ccf7253e3198e7c3ab8dce.sol#190-191)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x7d7415e984f21da7b2ccf7253e3198e7c3ab8dce.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/22/0x7d7415e984f21da7b2ccf7253e3198e7c3ab8dce.sol#1): it allows old versions
